name: Vannia / The Legend of Vania
description:
This stealth platformer game was made as an university assignment at UFPE.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys: Walking and climbing ladders
  • Z: Attack with knife
  • X: Shoot (you have 5 bullets only)
  • C: Hide on dark areas (it's actually useless)
  • V: Open / close doors

The full list of people involved in the project is in the Credits screen of the game.
